content.raw: All that security stuff got me thinking is runmanager secure? As it spawns a child process which executes code that it is given it would really be bad if not. Are there any checks in place to ensure that messages from the network won't be accepted or similar? I'm not all to familiar with the workings of zprocess @cbillington do you have a quick answer to this?
